feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-12T10:01:39.758762Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;在 Reddit 和 Digg 之前，有 Fark。然后用户恶意的重新设计杀死了它</stitle>; <id>;https://www.fark.com/comments/2762299/Fark-site-redesign-is-now-live-Hope-nothing-breaks-were-all -外出饮酒</id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T06:00:21.964042Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.fark.com/comments/2762299/Fark-site-redesign- is-now-live-Hope-nothing-breaks-were-all-out-drinking"/>; <author>; <name>;MrThoughtful</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= MrThoughtful</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://img.fark.net/images/2013/site/farkLogo2Big.gif" style="width: 220px; 高度: 221px;" />;<br />;Fark 是一个旧的新闻聚合网站，经过重新设计以更新其过时的外观。然而，一些用户担心评论部分的潜在烦恼。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#before-reddit-and-digg-there-was-fark-then-a-user-hostile-redesign-killed-it" target="_blank">; [总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36288886" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Douglas Crockford：“我们应该停止使用 JavaScript”</stitle>; <id>;https:// digest.browsertech.com/archive/browsertech-digest-9801/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-12T09:09:21.964806Z</更新>; <link href="https://digest.browsertech.com/ archive/browsertech-digest-9801/"/>; <author>; <name>;lrsjng</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lrsjng</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://buttondown-attachments.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/75383330-c643-494e-bee9-9c6270b3ca33.png" style="width: 220 像素；高度：220 像素；" />;<br />;Douglas Crockford 认为，由于累积的复杂性阻碍了我们的构建能力，软件行业应该从 JavaScript 转移。虽然 JavaScript 在管理 UI 状态方面表现不错，但它缺乏优化热路径代码、管理对象生命周期的功能，并且标准库有限。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#douglas-crockford-we-should-stop-using-javascript" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36290467" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Video to Video with Stable Diffusion (Step-by-Step) – 稳定扩散艺术</stitle>; <id>;https://stable-diffusion-art.com /video-to-video/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T05:00:21.965238Z</updated>; <link href="https://stable-diffusion-art.com/video-to-video /"/>; <author>; <name>;hui-zheng</​​name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hui-zheng</​​uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://i0.wp.com/stable-diffusion-art.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/cover-hi-res-00004-920280710.0.png?fit= 1200%2C800&ssl=1" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;本文提供了使用稳定扩散的 3 种视频到视频技术的分步指南，其中涉及在 ControlNet 的帮助下单独转换每个视频帧。该文章还包括对稳定扩散的其他视频到视频方法的调查。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#video-to-video-with-stable-diffusion-step-by-step-stable-diffusion-art" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36288294" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;英特尔全力支持背面供电</stitle>; <id>;https://spectrum.ieee.org /backside-power-delivery</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T23:00:21.965751Z</updated>; <link href="https://spectrum.ieee.org/backside-power-delivery"/>; <author>; <name>;mfiguiere</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mfiguiere</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://spectrum.ieee.org/media-library/grey-blocks-the-sizes-of-which-decrease-toward-a-thin-horizo​​ntal-white-line-and-then-increase-again-toward- the-top-of-the-image.jpg?id=33959767&width=1200&height=900" style="width: 220px; height: 166px;" />;<br />;英特尔已经构建并测试了处理器内核，这些内核由其当前一代的晶体管与 PowerVia 相结合，PowerVia 是一种为芯片供电的新方法，可消除硅下方的所有供电互连。由此产生的内核频率提升超过 6%，设计更紧凑，功耗降低 30%。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#intel-is-all-in-on-backside-power-delivery" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36286370" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;文档的惊人力量</stitle>; <id>;https://vadimkravcenko.com/shorts/proper-documentation/</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-12T03:00:21.966288Z</updated>; <link href="https://vadimkravcenko.com/shorts/proper-documentation/"/>; <author>; <name>;bndr</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bndr</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://api.microlink.io?adblock=false&waitForTimeout= 1500＆meta = false＆Screenshot＆Element =％23ScreenShot＆Embed = ScreenShot.url＆url＆url = https％3A％2f％2f％2fcards.microlink.io％2F％3FPRESET％3fpReset％3DCHRISBISCARDI％3DCHRIS-BISCARDI％26Name％26Name％26 name％2BKRAVAVAVAVAVAVAVAVAVAVAVAVAVAVAVAVAVAVAVCENKORTITITER％2BBKRAVCENKOTITITE啤酒％26title％3DTH％2Bsurprising %2BPower%2Bof%2BDocumentation" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;文档是初创企业的强大工具，可实现有效的知识共享，减少对会议的依赖，并促进深思熟虑的决策文化。它作为真理的普遍来源，从长远来看可以节省无数小时的生产力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-surprising-power-of-documentation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36287809" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Linux 6.5 附带 MIDI 2.0 驱动程序支持</stitle>; <id>;https://www.phoronix.com/news/MIDI-2.0-Support-Linux-6.5</id >; <更新>;2023-06-12T00:00:21.966704Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.phoronix.com/news/MIDI-2.0-Support-Linux-6.5"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rcarmo</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rcarmo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:/ /www.phoronix.com/assets/categories/multimedia.webp" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;Linux 6.5 将包括对 USB 音频和原始 MIDI 驱动程序的 MIDI 2.0 驱动程序支持，声音子系统维护者 Takashi Iwai 添加了大约 6,000 行新代码。 MIDI 2.0 为广泛使用的音乐设备协议提供了更高的分辨率、更好的清晰度以及各种新功能和改进。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#midi-2-0-driver-support-coming-with-linux-6-5" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36254672" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;章鱼中的温度依赖性 RNA 编辑重新编码神经蛋白质组</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cell.com/cell /fulltext/S0092-8674(23)00523-8</id>; <更新>;2023-06-12T05:00:21.967122Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.cell.com/cell/ fulltext/S0092-8674(23)00523-8"/>; <author>; <name>;wallflower</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=wallflower</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#temperature-dependent-rna-editing-in-octopus-recodes-the-neural-proteome" target="_blank" >;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36278739" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么选择 Perl？</stitle>; <id>;https://two-wrongs.com/ why-perl.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T09:15:21.967493Z</updated>; <link href="https://two-wrongs.com/why-perl.html"/>; < author>; <name>;Flimm</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Flimm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Perl 是一种通用语言，默认安装在任何地方，无需管理权限即可部署。它具有一小组核心语法，并且可以灵活地采用新范例，使其成为快速原型和可维护软件的不错选择。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-perl" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36290505" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;El Paquete Semanal</stitle>; <id>;https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/El_Paquete_Semanal</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T23:00:21.967890Z</updated>; < link href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/El_Paquete_Semanal"/>; <author>; <name>;jrott</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jrott< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;El Paquete Semanal 是一个 1TB 的数字资料集合，在古巴的地下市场上分发，作为宽带互联网的替代品。它包含电视连续剧、肥皂剧、音乐、电影和非法分类广告，以及视频剪辑、西班牙语新闻网站、计算机技术网站、教学视频、软件和古巴当地企业的广告。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#el-paquete-semanal" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36285363" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;Reddit 是否刚刚破坏了移动浏览器访问权限？</stitle>; <id>;https://reddit.com/r/help/comments/135tly1/helpdid_reddit_just_destroy_mobile_browser_access/</id>; <updated>;2023-06 -12T02:00:21.968782Z</updated>; <link href="https://reddit.com/r/help/comments/135tly1/helpdid_reddit_just_destroy_mobile_browser_access/"/>; <author>; <name>;xednir</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=xednir</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Reddit 用户报告移动浏览器访问存在问题，其中一些用户已注销且无法访问重新登录。移动视图还显示一个横幅，鼓励用户切换到该应用程序。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#did-reddit-just-destroy-mobile-browser-access" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36287411" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如何使用稳定扩散制作二维码</stitle>; <id>;https://stable-diffusion-art.com/qr-code/</id >; <updated>;2023-06-11T22:00:21.969278Z</updated>; <link href="https://stable-diffusion-art.com/qr-code/"/>; <author>; <name>;andrewon< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=andrewon</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i0.wp. com/stable-diffusion-art.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/image-53.png?fit=768%2C768&ssl=1" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;人们已经想出了如何使用名为 AUTOMATIC1111 的 GUI 在没有自定义模型的情况下使用 Stable Diffusion 制作 QR 码。成功率约为四分之一，具体取决于所使用的提示。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-to-make-a-qr-code-with-stable-diffusion" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36285630" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;升级我的 Chumby 8 内核第 5 部分：图形</stitle>; <id>;https://www.downtowndougbrown.com/2023/06/upgrading -my-chumby-8-kernel-part-5-graphics/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-12T04:00:21.969815Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.downtowndougbrown.com /2023/06/upgrading-my-chumby-8-kernel-part-5-graphics/"/>; <author>; <name>;zdw</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=zdw</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.downtowndougbrown.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/garbled-1024x855.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：184px；" />;<br />;作者升级了他们的 Chumby 设备的内核以使 LCD 正常工作，这涉及设置帧缓冲区、配置 LCD 控制器和打开背光。他们还探索使用 Vivante GC300 图形加速器和 etnaviv Linux 开源驱动程序。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#upgrading-my-chumby-8-kernel-part-5-graphics" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36287963" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Unabomber 是 AI 毁灭者</stitle>; <id>;https://newsletter.pessimistsarchive.org/p/the-unabomber-was-an- ai-doomer-obviously</id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T09:00:21.970486Z</updated>; <link href="https://newsletter.pessimistsarchive.org/p/the-unabomber-was-an -ai-doomer-obviously"/>; <author>; <name>;headalgorithm</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=headalgorithm</uri>; </author>; <content type= “html”>;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_2400,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws .com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fdb51e430-a979-4dd6-9285-4ce274fa4496_1987x1171.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：130px；" />;<br />;Unabomber 的宣言预测了一个由不同程度的人工智能统治的技术反乌托邦，人类在其中变得过时并且在不同程度上被剥夺了目的和有意义的工作。尽管面对人工智能的最新进展，他的一些预测似乎具有先见之明，但认真对待他对人工智能的看法是危险的，因为技术停滞几乎永远不是答案。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-unabomber-was-an-ai-doomer" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36290304" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Mojo 是比 Swift 更好的“没有 C 的 Objective-C”</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.metaobject.com/2023/06 /mojo-is-much-better-without-c-than.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T08:00:21.971169Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.metaobject. com/2023/06/mojo-is-much-better-without-c-than.html"/>; <author>; <name>;mpweiher</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=mpweiher</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/51CUIxt40HL._SX385_BO1,204,203,200_ .jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：284px；" />;<br />;Objective-C 通过结合用于脚本/集成的 Smalltalk 和用于组件语言的 C 解决了两种语言的问题。 Mojo 使用类似的方法，但将连接语言作为基础语言而不是组件语言。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mojo-is-a-much-better-objective-c-without-the-c-than-swift-ever-was" target="_blank">; [summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;无结构暴政（ 1970)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.jofreeman.com/joreen/tyranny.htm</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T21:00:21.971788Z</updated>; <link href=" https://www.jofreeman.com/joreen/tyranny.htm"/>; <author>; <name>;mooreds</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mooreds</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;文章讨论了妇女解放运动中的“无结构”思想，并认为不可能有一个真正无结构的团体。作者认为，将一个群体的结构正式化可以防止非正式结构和群体内部精英的形成。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-tyranny-of-structurelessness-1970" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36285097" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;从栈到树：Rust 的新别名模型</stitle>; <id>;https://www.ralfj.de/blog/2023/06/02/tree-borrows .html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T20:00:21.972238Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.ralfj.de/blog/2023/06/02/tree-borrows. html"/>; <author>; <name>;obl</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=obl</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Neven正在为 Rust 开发一种名为 Tree Borrows 的新别名模型，旨在解决当前模型 Stacked Borrows 的问题，并为两阶段借用提供适当的支持。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#from-stacks-to-trees-a-new-aliasing-model-for-rust" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36268671" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;法官否认亚马逊和苹果驳回集体诉讼价格诉讼的动议</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/ tech-policy/2023/06/judge-allows-apple-and-amazon-price-fixing-lawsuit-to-move-forward/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T05:00:21.972669Z</updated >; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/tech-policy/2023/06/judge-allows-apple-and-amazon-price-fixing-lawsuit-to-move-forward/"/>; <作者>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https:/ /cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/gettyimages-1231746798-594x594-1.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;一名联邦法官驳回了苹果和亚马逊提出的驳回消费者反垄断诉讼的动议，该诉讼指控这两家科技巨头串通取消亚马逊在线商店中除价格最高的苹果产品以外的所有产品。此案可以继续进行，苹果产品在亚马逊上的具体市场以及全球原则协议对其的影响将由陪审团决定。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#judge-denies-amazons-apples-motions-to-dismiss-class-action-price-fixing-suit" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36288328" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;私钥修订：Ur doin it rong (2020)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.hezmatt .org/~mpalmer/blog/2020/05/17/private-key-redaction-ur-doin-it-rong.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-12T04:00:21.973079Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.hezmatt.org/~mpalmer/blog/2020/05/17/private-key-redaction-ur-doin-it-rong.html"/>; <作者>; <姓名>; womble</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=womble</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;由于私有方式，编辑私钥可能无效密钥被表示，只有一小部分数据实际上需要重建密钥。即使在编辑之后，这也可能导致私人信息被暴露。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#private-key-redaction-ur-doin-it-rong-2020" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36285607" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;拯救印度航空公司在俄罗斯转移的 777 的物流挑战</stitle>; <id>;https://www.flightradar24.com/blog/air-india-俄罗斯转移/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T21:00:21.973680Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.flightradar24.com/blog/air-india-russia-diversion/ "/>; <author>; <name>;dmitrygr</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dmitrygr</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.flightradar24.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/VT-ALH.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：128px；" />;<br />;印度航空公司从新德里飞往旧金山的173号班机因引擎问题转飞俄罗斯马加丹。 216 名乘客在当地一所学校避难，等待第二架飞机。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#logistics-challenges-of-saving-air-indias-diverted-777-in-russia" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36285049" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;破解 PHR-803T (2014)</stitle>; <id>;http://www.diyouware.com/node/161< /id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T06:00:21.974158Z</updated>; <link href="http://www.diyouware.com/node/161"/>; <author>; <name>;_Microsoft</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=_Microsoft</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="http://www.diyouware.com /sites/default/files//styles/large/public/image001.jpg?itok=n0uun5Ya" style="宽度：220px；高度：165px；" />;<br />;这篇文章描述了破解 PHR-803T（一种用于 Xbox 360 DVD 播放器的紫外线激光二极管）来创建 PCB 打印机的过程。作者使用逆向工程找出连接器的引脚排列，并通过其自身的电子设备控制激光功率、激光振荡器和其他功能。他们最终创造了一个名为 TwinTeeth 的多功能机器人，它可以使用 PHR-803T 和改进的电子驱动器在家里制作 PCB。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hacking-the-phr-803t-2014" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Facebook 上的苹果高管 (2011)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.techemails.com /p/apple-execs-on-facebook</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T22:00:21.974519Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.techemails.com/p/apple- execs-on-facebook"/>; <author>; <name>;cocacola1</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cocacola1</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518- adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F79fc15fc-6ea8-4426-acad-117e6c349ba0_922x876.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：209px；" />;<br />;Apple 高管讨论了是否在 Facebook iPad 应用程序中包含嵌入式应用程序，最终决定不包含应用程序目录，并且只允许新闻源中与应用程序相关的用户帖子。他们还讨论了是否允许链接到不接受 Facebook Credits 或没有本地 iOS 应用程序但要求任何使用 Facebook Credits 的开发人员使用本地应用程序的网站。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#apple-execs-on-facebook-2011" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36285640" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Covid 前几周的武汉实验室内</stitle>; <id>;https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/inside-wuhan-lab-covid-pandemic-china -america-qhjwwwvm0</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T10:00:21.974915Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/inside-wuhan-lab- covid-pandemic-china-america-qhjwwwvm0"/>; <author>; <name>;ricksunny</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ricksunny</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;<img src="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/imageserver/image/%2Fmethode%2Fsundaytimes%2Fprod%2Fweb%2Fbin%2F5aedcbf4-06ec-11ee-a1e5-6222cf71d60e.jpg ?crop=1575%2C886%2C0%2C0&resize=360" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;武汉的科学家据称与中国军方进行了结合致命冠状病毒以制造一种新的变异病毒的危险实验，这导致了武汉病毒研究所的泄密，并引发了 Covid-19 疫情。这项工作是与中国军方的研究人员合作完成的，中国军方为其提供资金并研究生物武器。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#inside-the-wuhan-lab-weeks-before-covid" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36276268" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Reddit subreddits 的直播以抗议私有化</stitle>; <id>;https://www.twitch.tv/reddark_247</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-12T04:00:21.975281Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.twitch.tv/reddark_247"/>; <author>; <name>;minimaxir</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=minimaxir</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static-cdn.jtvnw.net/user-default-pictures-uv /215b7342-def9-11e9-9a66-784f43822e80-profile_image-300x300.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;Reddark 24/7 逆流 (reddark.untone.uk) <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#livestream-of-reddit-subreddits-going-private-in-protest " target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36288159" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</ content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;领域知识或缺乏（2013）</stitle>; < id>;https://jacquesmattheij.com/domain-knowledge-or-a-lack-thereof/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T20:00:21.975643Z</更新>; <link href="https: //jacquesmattheij.com/domain-knowledge-or-a-lack-thereof/"/>; <author>; <name>;ggr2342</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ggr2342 </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;缺乏领域知识是糟糕软件开发的主要原因。获取领域知识对于开发有效的软件至关重要。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#domain-knowledge-or-a-lack-thereof-2013" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36268339" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;机场睡眠指南</stitle>; <id>;https://www.sleepinginairports.net/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T20 :00:21.976009Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.sleepinginairports.net/"/>; <author>; <name>;DerekBickerton</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=DerekBickerton</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.sleepinginairports.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/sleeping-in -airports-og.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;文章讨论机场睡觉如何不再只是年轻背包客的专利，而是因为早班机、长途停留、航班取消等各种原因而成为各个年龄段旅行者的普遍做法。机场睡眠指南是一种提供机场指南和评论的资源，可帮助您获得更舒适的体验。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-guide-to-sleeping-in-airports" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36284805" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;亚马逊的第一份工作清单</stitle>; <id>;https://groups.google.com/g/ba.jobs.offered/c/-rvJUMBbZ18</id>; <更新>;2023-06-12T09:00:21.976744Z</更新>; <link href="https://groups.google.com/g/ba.jobs.offered/c/-rvJUMBbZ18"/>; <作者>; <name>;nicocerdeira</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nicocerdeira</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;亚马逊在 1994 年发布了一份求职清单才华横溢的 C/C++/Unix 开发人员，帮助开拓互联网上的商业。上市需要设计和构建大型复杂系统的经验，以及一流的沟通技巧。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#amazon-s-first-job-listing" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36290370" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;在玛丽的脑海中：凡尔赛花园令人难忘的邂逅 (1913)</stitle>; <id>;https://publicdomainreview.org/collection/an-adventure</ id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T04:00:21.977224Z</updated>; <link href="https://publicdomainreview.org/collection/an-adventure"/>; <author>; <name>;apollinaire</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=apollinaire</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://the-public-domain- review.imgix.net/collections/an-adventure/petit-trianon-stereo.jpg?fit=max&w=1200&h=850" style="宽度：220px；高度：109px；" />;<br />;1901年，两位英国女性游览凡尔赛宫，在花园里有一段奇异的经历，看到人们穿着古色古香的衣服，感受到一种不寻常的气氛。他们后来推测，在 1792 年杜乐丽宫遭到袭击的那一天，他们进入了玛丽·安托瓦内特的脑海。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#in-the-mind-of-marie -a-haunting-encounter-in-the-gardens-of-versailles-1913" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =36277067" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type= "text">;Treebomination：将 scikit-learn 决策树转换为 Keras 模型</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/Dobiasd/treebomination</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T22:00： 21.977850Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/Dobiasd/treebomination"/>; <作者>; <name>;Dobiasd</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=Dobiasd</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Dobiasd/treebomination/main/images/treebomination_logo.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;Treebomination 是一种将 scikit-learn 决策树转换为 Keras 模型的工具，它通过用两个神经元模拟每个决策节点并初始化权重和偏差以输出与树相似的结果。生成的神经网络具有与原始树相似的精度，但预测时间更快。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#treebomination-convert-a-scikit-learn-decision-tree-into-a-keras-model" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36282748" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Silvio Berlusconi，一位颠覆意大利政治和文化的艺人去世，享年 86 岁</stitle>; <id>;https://www. nytimes.com/2023/06/12/world/europe/silvio-berlusconi-dead.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-12T09:13:21.978248Z</更新>; <link href="https:/ /www.nytimes.com/2023/06/12/world/europe/silvio-berlusconi-dead.html"/>; <author>; <name>;kensai</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=kensai</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2023/06/12/multimedia/12Berlusconi-obit -tmjl/12Berlusconi-obit-tmjl-articleLarge.jpg?quality=75&auto=webp&disable=upscale" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;备受争议的意大利前总理西尔维奥·贝卢斯科尼 (Silvio Berlusconi) 去世，享年 86 岁。贝卢斯科尼以其媒体帝国、丑闻和两极分化的政治生涯而闻名，长达 20 多年。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#silvio-berlusconi-a-showman-who-upended-italian-politics-and-culture-dies-at-86" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36290494" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;凸优化 (2004) [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://web.stanford。 edu/~boyd/cvxbook/bv_cvxbook.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06-12T00:00:21.978603Z</更新>; <link href="https://web.stanford.edu/~boyd/cvxbook /bv_cvxbook.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;newsoul</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=newsoul</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#convex-optimization-2004-pdf" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36268320" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
